serveur¶

Python program to implement server side of multpiple chat rooms.

Execute using Python2.7

See README.md for futher informations on how to use this code.

Functions

broadcast(message, connection, chan) Broadcast the message to all clients except the one who sent the message.
changerchan(conn, name, ancien, nouveau) Removes the old connection in one room and create a new one in the chosen room.
clientthread(conn, addr) Manages the connection of a specific user
connected_users() Returns a display of users present on server.
remove(connection, chan) Removes the user from the list of clients (in a specific room)
remove_from_server(connection, chan, name) Removes the client from the list of clients and the list of users — To use for users leaving the server
